messages.title: The Liberal Democrats are WINNING
messages.content: Right across the UK, Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are winning and gaining momentum.

messages.title: Vote Liberal Democrat for a brighter future
messages.content: It's Lib Dem Tom Morrison or the Conservatives here. Only a vote for the Lib Dems can stop the Conservatives here in Cheadle.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will protect our NHS and ensure our schools are properly funded.

mentions.candidate: Tom Morrison is fighting to give Cheadle Constituency a better deal.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives. Labour Party cannot win in our area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Tom told the campaign for more police on our streets and supported local residents and businesses when they were hit by the floods.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaign for more police on the streets, supported residents and businesses affected by floods.

images.caption: Tom and his wife Carla enjoying local beauty spot Bramall Hall
